title: Curitiba
summary: Curitiba (Brazilian Portuguese: [kuɾiˈtʃibɐ]) is the capital and largest city in the Brazilian state of Paraná. The city's population was 1,948,626 as of 2020, making it the eighth most populous city in Brazil and the largest in Brazil's South Region. The Curitiba Metropolitan area comprises 26 municipalities[2] with a total population of over 3.2 million (IBGE estimate in 2010),[3] making it the seventh most populous metropolitan area in the country.
